author: Staff Reporter
text:
A free training programme on ‘Roof top gardening’ will be held at the Krishi Vigyan Kendra in Veterinary College and Research Institute premises on Mohanur Road on March 30.

A press release from N. Akila, Senior Scientist and Head, said that the programme would deal with importance of roof top gardening, types of vegetables that can be cultivated, watering methods, use of fertilizers and effective use of available space. Various techniques involved in the gardening process would be explained during the training programme.

For registration visit the KVK in person or register through phone: 04286-266345 and 266650. Only 30 people can participate in the training programme. Registration is mandatory by March 29, the release added.
title: Training on roof top gardening
